scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend lint not configured'
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
